mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM DSL_LICENSE WHERE LIC_NO=#{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DSL_LICENSE ( MSG_ID, APPLE_TYPE, APPLY_DATE, APPLY_COMPLIET_DATE, LIC_NO, COMPANY_NAME, INDU_COMM_BUSINESS_LICENCE, MANAGER_NAME, IDCARD, BUSINESS_ADDR, LEASE_TIMELIMIT_END, IS_VALIDATE, ISSUE_ORG_CODE, RETAIL_CID_TYPE, RETAIL_CID_NO, RETAIL_CID_ADDRESS, RETAIL_ADDRESS, CONTRACT_PERSON, RETAIL_TEL, SPECIAL_PERSON_GROUP, BUSI_MGR_LIC_VALIDITY, BIZ_FORMAT, AREA_TYPE, ECO_TYPE, ECO_TYPE_OTHER, RLIC_ADC, CREATE_TIME, BIZ_AREA, IS_CHAIN, IS_MAIN, IS_BUSINESS, SPECIAL_GROUP_TYPE_OTHER, OLD_LIC_NO, SUPPLY_COMPANY_CODE, AGENT_NAME, AGENT_IDCARD, FIRST_ACCREDI_DATE, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, LAST_APPLY_TIME, LAST_OPERATE_COMPLETE_TIME, LAST_OPERATE_TYPE, LAST_OPERATE_NAME, LAST_OPERATE_LOGNAME, REMARK, EXT1, EXT2 ) VALUES ( #{MSG_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APPLE_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APPLY_DATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APPLY_COMPLIET_DATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LIC_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
